title: Sadu Kudu Vizhiyil Lyrics Sivappu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Sadu Kudu Vizhiyil
Movie: Sivappu
Singer: 
Music: N.R. Ragunanthan
Lyrics: Kabilanvairamuthu

Sadu kudu vizhiyil
sudugira mayakkam.
en vidukadhai iravil
vidivadhai marakkum.

porakkala boomi veesi aerindha
pookkalill ondru pesiyadhindru

unnai saaitha pallangalai
niraivaaga moodugiren
en manadhoram nadandhu vara
oru vazhi chaalai podugiren

uyirin kanigal unadhadi
un kanneer thuligal enadhadi
uyirin kanigal unadhadi
un kanneer thuligal enadhadi
sadu kudu vizhiyil
sudugira mayakkam.
en vidukadhai iravil
vidivadhai marakkum.

Maaya penmaye thaedi thaediye
unnai theeyil thalliye maraindheney
Kangal kandadhoru eera kaatchiyaal
mandai narambugal nanaidheney

Agadhi koodaaram kadandhu vandhu
en sagadhi manaveliyil vilundhaaye
sagadhi manaveliyai pullveliyaakki
sidharum pookkalaai nadandhaaye

Eera dhevadhai vazha vazhave 
thooya paavangal naan puriven
vidiyal keetrinil visirigal seidhu
adimai kaayangal aatriduven

uyirin kanigal unadhadi
un kanneer thuligal enadhadi
uyirin kanigal unadhadi
un kanneer thuligal enadhadi

Sadu kudu ...

Paavai munnerum paadhai engilum
paavi muttkalai polindheney
kaalam paanaadhu kavidhaii ondrai
kappal seidhida ninaindheney

vaanam maaligaithaan anuppiya
motha garvam ena molindheyney
Chinna kudisaiyil olindhukidakkum
uththa santhangal ariyeney

Naanariyaamal en siru meesai
undhan vaasalil mandiyidum
ennai ketkaamal en kudai
unaiyum unaiyum ulladakkum

uyirin kanigal unadhadi
un kanneer thuligal enadhadi
uyirin kanigal unadhadi
un kanneer thuligal enadhadi
